sentences.english: After the war, Reich returned to Salzburg.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，雷克回到了薩爾斯堡。

sentences.english: Brita in grant her colony independence in the year after the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 二進制戰後的年代理英國准許其殖民地獨立。

sentences.english: The difference between Kosovo and South Ossetia has been starker still in the war’s aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 科索沃與南奧塞梯事件的區別在戰後表現得更加明顯。

sentences.english: After the war, two-thirds of the people of Hawaii supported statehood.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，夏威夷三分之二人贊同獲得美國州的地位。

sentences.english: Angola is under its post-war reconstruction with everything waiting to be taken up.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉正在進行戰後重建工作，百廢待興。

sentences.english: Sweden leads to the implementation of social assistance in the post-war policy ideas and practices.
sentences.chinese: 引出了瑞典在戰後實施社會救助政策的理念和做法。

sentences.english: Despite the hardships of the post-war years and the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 儘管有戰後年代及蕭條時期的艱難因苦。

sentences.english: Glasberg, his brothers and parents emigrated to Canada after the war ended.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，格萊斯伯格及其父母兄弟移民加拿大。

sentences.english: The Great Migration after the First World War can be regarded as the escape from the miserable life in the South.
sentences.chinese: 一戰後的大移民是黑人爲逃避南方悲慘生活的大逃亡。

sentences.english: After the war the two country draw up a disgreement.
sentences.chinese: 戰後兩國起草了一個合約。

sentences.english: Besides, there are very few skilled stone workers left after the war years.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在戰後年代之後，有技術的石工寥寥無幾。

sentences.english: How would they cope with the aftermath of the war?
sentences.chinese: 他們會如何處理戰後餘殃？

sentences.english: The story of Asia’s post-war miracle is above all a maritime one.
sentences.chinese: 戰後亞洲的奇蹟是一個關於海洋的故事。

sentences.english: The chief architect of post war Republican organizational strength into Ohio was Ray C. Bliss .
sentences.chinese: 戰後組織俄亥俄州共和黨力量的主將是雷兒布利斯。

sentences.english: The Theatre of the Absurd was a new school of drama appeared on the stage of the Western world after World War II.
sentences.chinese: 荒誕派戲劇是戰後出現在歐洲舞臺上的新的戲劇流派。

sentences.english: Mainly in the view of Britain, the article touches on Anglo-American economic relations in the early days after the World War II.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要從英國的角度闡述了戰後初期英美經濟關係。
